about_the_game:
Story background: In the ancient dark era, our spiritual world was once again attacked by demons! Facing the powerful demon, as the guardian of the spiritual world, Love Little Red did not compromise and fought against it to the bottom. In the battle, he realized that only with the power of kindness and love can the demon be completely defeated. Because demons do not understand benevolence, this is their fatal injury. So when facing demons, you must remain calm, kind, and loving to fight, and not lose your sanity! Otherwise, you will go crazy! (Anger and force can only increase the power of demons) Xiaohong concentrated her intelligence, condensed the power of love, and transformed a variety of strange moves and spells, finally defeating the demons! Demons have to be subdued! Amitabha Buddha! May our spiritual world always remain calm and peaceful!

Player 1: WSAD key controls movement, double-click direction key to run, J key attacks, W key jumps, L key defense, UIOPFGH key special skill attacks
"Love Red" is a gorgeous action fighting game!

Regarding this game, there are a lot of skills set up, and players can use the keyboard to control their characters and play different skills, as the characters have many different skills set up. Double click on the direction to start running! Pressing k twice can achieve double jumping! The impact feeling of this game is very strong! It's easy to shoot the enemy out!

Unique and outstanding battles: There will be a large number of different monster life forms in the game! Defeat opponents in any situation, experience the passion of battle, fully unleash potential, and unleash different skills through various key combinations.
The opponent possesses strong strength and wisdom, and they will do their best to knock you down.
Secret: There are many secrets and surprises waiting for you to explor

name: love Red

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1GHz 32-bit or 64-bit processors
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Inter(R)Core(TM)i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: This is an independent game! It's quite difficult! You need to have love, courage, and wisdom to pass the level! It has a unique gameplay. I hope you can experience endless fun from it! This is definitely worth it! Hope everyone likes it! I will do better!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Japanese*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Korean*, Uzbek*, Urdu*, Armenian*, Igbo*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Croatian*, Icelandic*, Cherokee*, Galician*, Catalan*, Afrikaans*, Kannada*, Luxembourgish*, Hindi*, Gujarati*, Kyrgyz*, Kazakh*, Turkmen*, K'iche'*, Kinyarwanda*, Tajik*, Serbian*, Odia*, Welsh*, Konkani*, Bangla*, Nepali*, Basque*, Hebrew*, Latvian*, Tigrinya*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Swahili*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Georgian*, Maori*, Wolof*, Bosnian*, Persian*, Telugu*, Tamil*, Irish*, Estonian*, Valencian*, Belarusian*, Quechua*, Zulu*, Xhosa*, Lithuanian*, Sotho*, Sorani*, Yoruba*, Uyghur*, Scots*, Tswana*, Filipino*, Mongolian*, Hausa*, Dari*, Azerbaijani*, Amharic*, Albanian*, Assamese*, Tatar*, Macedonian*, Marathi*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Khmer*
